com.android.camera

Class CropImageIntentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.camera.CropImageIntentBuilder

  • public class CropImageIntentBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    By default the following features are enabled, unless you override them by calling setters in the builder:
    • Scale;
    • Scale up (if needed);
    • Face detection;
    Since:
    1.0.1

      • setOutputQuality

        public CropImageIntentBuilder setOutputQuality(int outputQuality)
        Set the quality for the output file when applicable. This is used for JPEG output format for example.
        Parameters:
        outputQuality - The quality (0 is smallest file size, 100 is best quality)
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • setScale

        public CropImageIntentBuilder setScale(boolean scale)
        Scales down the picture.
        Parameters:
        scale - Whether to scale down the image.
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • setScaleUpIfNeeded

        public CropImageIntentBuilder setScaleUpIfNeeded(boolean scaleUpIfNeeded)
        Whether to scale up the image if the cropped region is smaller than the output size.
        Parameters:
        scaleUpIfNeeded - Whether to scale up the image.
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • setDoFaceDetection

        public CropImageIntentBuilder setDoFaceDetection(boolean doFaceDetection)
        Performs face detection before allowing users to crop the image.
        Parameters:
        doFaceDetection - Whether to perform face detection.
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • setBitmap

        public CropImageIntentBuilder setBitmap(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        Sets bitmap data to crop. Please note that this method overrides any source image set by setSourceImage(Uri).
        Parameters:
        bitmap - The Bitmap to crop.
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • setSourceImage

        public CropImageIntentBuilder setSourceImage(android.net.Uri sourceImage)
        Sets the Uri of the image to crop. It must be accessible to the calling application/activity.
        Parameters:
        sourceImage - Uri of the image to crop.
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • setCircleCrop

        public CropImageIntentBuilder setCircleCrop(boolean circleCrop)
        Whether to crop the image as circle
        Parameters:
        circleCrop - Whether to crop the image as circle.
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • setOutputFormat

        public CropImageIntentBuilder setOutputFormat(java.lang.String outputFormat)
        Set output format of the image to crop. If not set, JPEG will be used.
        Parameters:
        outputFormat - Output format of the image to crop, such as JPEG, PNG or WEBP.
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.
        Since:
        1.0.1
